issue.description: Unlocalized component AC002321.1 may be redundant with localized components BX324209.11,BX649571.6 or BX629352.5.
issue.resolution_text: AC002321 looks to be redundant within BX324209.11,BX649571.6,BX629352.5 It has been removed from the TPF

issue.status_text: Currently determining how best to represent variation in the reference.
issue.description: The reference genome is representing the D14 (less common) allele of NM_017680.4
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Drop NCBI36 unlocalized scaffold NT_113912 b/c sole component is phase 1
issue.description: NCBI36 chr.9 unlocalized scaffold NT_113912 is comprised entirely of phase 1 sequence (AC025861.3).
issue.resolution_text: This scaffold/component is not included in GRCh37.

issue.summary: There is a gap between BX664724 and the centromere
issue.description: There is a gap between BX664724 and the centromere
issue.resolution_text: The gap between BX664724.8 and the centromere is an incorrect pairing and no longer exists, see HG-1503 for information on the TPF rearrangement. This update will be reflected in GRCh38, for users wishing to see the updated path ahead of the assembly it can be found here: ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pub/grc/human/MOST_RECENT/Reference/

issue.summary: There is a gap between CR788268 and AL953854
issue.description: Due to a TPF update post-GRCh37, there is now a gap between CR788268.5 and AL953854.21.
issue.resolution_text: FP325309.9 has been finished and incorporated into the TPF to close this gap.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC238707.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.description: NOVEL patch GL383539.1 created to capture sequence from AC238707.3 not represented in reference chromosome
issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383539.1 created to capture ~14.8 kb sequence from AC238707.3 not represented in reference chromosome NC_00009.11.

issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383541.1 created to capture 6075 bp sequence from AC212493.4 not represented in GRCh37 reference chromosome NC_000009.11.

issue.summary: NOVEL patch created to capture sequence from AC215799.3 not represented in reference chromosome

issue.resolution_text: NOVEL patch GL383542.1 created to capture ~11 kb sequence from AC215799.3 not represented in GRCh37 reference chromosome NC_000009.11.

issue.description: RefSeq NM_199358.1 has a poor alignment to the FOXD4L3 locus in Hs Build 36, suggesting that a biological segmental duplication is missing.
issue.resolution_text: Alignments of FOXD4 paralogs to GRCh37 suggest that there is no problem in the current assembly.

issue.description: Possible single nucleotide error in AL356494, highlighted by a difference with NM_020702
issue.resolution_text: CHM1 WGS contig AMYH02019445.1 has been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component AL356494.13 and improving the alignment of KIAA1161 to the reference.

issue.description: Report of a RefSeq accession (NM_001013664.1) missing from the reference. The 5' end of this accession aligns adjacent to a contig gap.
issue.resolution_text: The contig gap between components AL360004.22 and AL354898.10 has been closed with the addition of finished clone sequence and WGS components FP565345.4, ABBA01043973.1, AUXG01000072.1 and ABBA01012042.1. The addition of these components provides complete representation for the HMCN2 gene.

issue.description: Several clones have been selected for sequencing that align near the AL355151.11 - CR769776.8 region of Chr. 9. These may be used to improve the reference or to represent an alternate haplotype.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: FIX patch for Chr.9 Gap Problem Region #3 (right side)
issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap between CR392000.2 and BX649589.3. This is a duplicate issue used for patch release of an extension from the right side into the gap.
issue.resolution_text: An extension from the right side into this gap since GRCh37 has been released as a FIX patch: GL383538.1.

issue.summary: Can unlocalized scaffold NT_113915 be localized for GRCh38?
issue.description: Chr. 9 unlocalized scaffold NT_113915.1 (GL000200.1), comprised of component BX088588.4, needs to be localized.
issue.resolution_text: Scaffold NT_113915.1 comprising the sole draft component BX088588.5 has been removed from the chromosome 9 unlocalised TPF as redundant under reference components AL162415.16/BX088651.9. The scaffold will not be retained for future assemblies.

issue.summary: Can unlocalized scaffold NT_113911 be localized for GRCh38?
issue.description: Chr. 9 unlocalized scaffold NT_113911.1 (GL000201.1), comprised of component AC002321.1, needs to be localized.
issue.resolution_text: The unlocalised chromosome 9 scaffold NT_113911.1 (GL000201.1) containing the sole draft component AC002321.1 is redundant under components BX324209.11/BX649571.6/BX629352.5/AC002101.1 This scaffold will not be retained for GRCh38.

issue.summary: Fix patch for Chr.9 Gap Problem (left side)
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX649601.2 and AL354796.21. This is a duplicate issue used for patch release of an extension from the left side into the gap.
issue.resolution_text: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX649601.2 and AL354796.21. This is a duplicate issue used for patch release of an extension from the left side into the gap.

issue.summary: Fix patch for Chr.9 Gap Problem (right side)
issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX649601.2 and AL354796.21. This is a duplicate issue used for patch release of an extension from the right side into the gap.
issue.resolution_text: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX649601.2 and AL354796.21. This is a duplicate issue used for patch release of an extension from the right side into the gap.

issue.description: Report of a RefSeq accession (NM_001013664.1) missing from the reference. The 5' end of this accession aligns adjacent to a contig gap. This is a duplicate issue used for patch release of an extension from the left side into the gap.
issue.resolution_text: Report of a RefSeq accession (NM_001013664.1) missing from the reference. The 5' end of this accession aligns adjacent to a contig gap. This is a duplicate issue used for patch release of an extension from the left side into the gap.

issue.summary: Optical map suggests path problems around the centromere on both the p and q arms.
issue.status_text: Investigation is underway to improve this currently highly fragmented region in the reference assembly.
issue.description: Optical map analysis is not concordant with the current placement of small contigs around the centromere on both the p and q arms of chromosome 9.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Rare bases in clinically relevant gene (DFNB31) need to be corrected
issue.description: Two bases in DFNB31 are extremely rare (NC_000009.11:117188566 and NC_000009.11:117166338) and are being reviewed for updating.
issue.resolution_text: Mini-contigs KF459656.1 and KF459658.1 have been added to the GRCh38 reference assembly patching component AL138895.16 and improving the alignment of DFNB31 to the reference.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible sequence error in ABO
issue.description: There is a missing a G at chr9:136,132,908 in ABO gene
issue.resolution_text: Issue reported in HG-79 and released as FIX patch in GRCh37.p1. Accession for FIX patch is GL339450.1

issue.summary: BX088702.10 is an unlocalized sequence from chr. 9
issue.status_text: BX088702.10 has been placed on the Chr9_UNLOCALIZED TPF until placement in the reference TPF can be ascertained.
issue.description: BX088702.10 is an unlocalized sequence from chr. 9 that may belong near the centromere
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: Possible clone misassembly
issue.status_text: Assessing assembly of AL159990.12 for possible misassembly.
issue.description: GRCh37.p12 Clone AL159990.12 RP11-141J10 contains an 18kbp segmental duplication matching sequence within the clone itself. However, read coverage from the 1000 Genomes Project indicates this to be a within reference duplication rather than paralogous sequence (possibly a misassaembly of the clone itself).
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: ESP analysis suggests the reference chromosome contains a deletion within AL158826.23
issue.resolution_text: AL158826 was shown to contain a deletion and so has been replaced by AL772161. AL772161 provides ~9kb of additional data that is supported by the Huref accession ABBA01032463.1.

issue.summary: Non-component (GRCh37.p10) HTG sequence AC216089.3 contains sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly

issue.resolution_text: An ALT_LOCI has been created to capture sequence present in the 1kG ph1 decoy but absent from the Reference assembly.

issue.summary: Non-functional ABO allele represented in GRCh38
issue.description: GRCh38 was supposed to represent a functional ABO*A1.02 allele contained solely within AL772161.10, as represented in the NW_003315925.1 fix patch and discussed in JIRA HG-79. However, GRCh38 (NC_000009.12) has a different tiling path compared to the fix patch, and a non-functional O-type ABO allele is instead represented.
issue.resolution_text: The switchpoint has been updated to include the full insert of component AL772161.10 in the TPF and represent a functional ABO*A1.02 allele in the reference assembly.

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113917(component: BX322591.1) has an alignment to existing sequence in reference chr. 9
issue.resolution_text: NCBI36 chr. 9 unlocalized contig NT_113917(component: BX322591.1) was not included in GRCh37.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL353638.15
issue.description: Analysis of GU268755.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 9, suggest there may be ~4,814 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL353638.15. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: Component AC245202.1 has been added to the reference assembly. This sequence represents a 4.8kb insertion variation.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL355975.10
issue.description: Analysis of GU268792.1 and GU268944.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 9, suggest there may be ~4,381 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL355975.10. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: Component AC203630.3 has been added to the reference assembly. This sequence represents a 4.4kb insertion variation.

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within BX537321.14
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267898.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 9, suggest there may be ~5,928 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component BX537321.14. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL627303.17
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines does not support the GRCh38 assembly and are consistent with an insertion of 5.1kb sequence. Finished components AC213193.1 and AC215710.4 also support the insertion relative to the reference assembly.
issue.description: Analysis of GU268354.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 9, suggest there may be ~5,215 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL627303.17. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL354855.26
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines and overlapping component AL158039.5 indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267491.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 9, suggest there may be ~1,142 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL354855.26. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Possible misassembly or indel variation in GRCh38 within AL353615.37
issue.status_text: Analysis of optical mapping cell lines indicate that the indel is sequence variation.
issue.description: Analysis of GU267757.1, GU268814.1, GU267683.1 and GU268891.1 along with alignment of HuRef Chr. 9, suggest there may be ~3,115 bp sequence missing from the reference assembly within component AL353615.37. This may represent variation or an assembly error.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Replace IUPAC ambiguity bases in GRCh38
issue.description: Ambiguous IUPAC bases in NC_000009.12: 89883952 (R), 89884096 (Y) and 89884247 (Y) in component AEKP01166227.1.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Assembly component AL732364.10 has had an accession.version update
issue.description: Assembly component AL732364.10 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: The update of assembly component AL732364.10 is described in HG-2030, no further curation is required here

issue.description: Assembly component FO681513.3 has had an accession.version update. GRC curator review needed to ensure proper representation in future assembly versions.
issue.resolution_text: FO681513.3 is currently an unfinished phase 2 clone, updates may occur if the clone assembly progresses.

issue.description: Unplaced contig NT_113917(component: BX322591.1) has an alignment to existing sequence in reference chr. 9
issue.resolution_text: NCBI36 chr. 9 unlocalized contig NT_113917(component: BX322591.1) was not included in GRCh37.

issue.description: The HMCN2 gene spans a gap in the reference assembly in build 36.2, where AL360004.22 contains the 5' end of the gene and AL354898.10 contains the 3' end.
issue.resolution_text: The same gap is being investigated in HG-131, all further work will carried out and recorded through that ticket

issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between AL606807.34 and BX470209.3.
issue.resolution_text: Finished components FO680661.2 and FP565589.4 close a gap in the reference assembly between AL606807.34 and BX470209.3.

issue.status_text: 01-JUL-13: ABC10-45509200N16 is completed sequence, HTGS phase 3 13-JUN-13: ABC8-42546500O8 is in active finishing Accession for ABC10-45509200N16: FO681505 Accession for ABC8-42546500O8: FO681513
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is smaller than reported gap size between BX470209.3 and AL451122.7.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.status_text: Current resourses/technologies have been exhausted and preclude the closure of this contig gap. The gap size as determined by optical map analysis is 3kb
issue.description: Optical map data suggests genomic gap is larger than reported gap size between CR392000.2 and BX649589.3.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL590812.9 and BX088645.7
issue.resolution_text: The reported gap is closed as BX088645.7 and BX664726.5 have been removed as redundant under AL353729, AL162501, BX005214, and BX248098. Ongoing work in this assembly region continues in ticket HG-568.

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components BX664726.5 and AL353791.7
issue.resolution_text: The gap between AL590812 and AL353791 no longer exists, AL353791 is still next to a gap but AL590812 was found to be redundat within the main contig of human chr:9 a new ticket will be opened to track further work on AL353791

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL353791.7 and AL592525.10
issue.resolution_text: AL353791.7 and AL592525.10 overlap each other, this is confirmed by CH17-370E13

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL592525.10 and AL162233.14
issue.resolution_text: The gap between AL592525.10 and AL162233.14 is an incorrect pairing and no longer exists, see HG-1503 for information on the TPF rearrangement. issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL596385.12 and AL590491.13

issue.description: There is a gap in the assembly between components AL591471.8 and AC129778.5
issue.resolution_text: There is no longer a gap between AL59147 and AC129778. It was found that if the contig starting with AC129778 was inverted (based on Optical Map data (cell line 15510 showed it most clearly)) it overlaped the contig ending with AL59147. Making this join made AL513478, AL136317, FP885919 and AL669942 redundant.

issue.summary: Should unplaced contig NT_113961 be retained in the assembly?
issue.description: Investigation of unplaced contig NT_113961
issue.resolution_text: Unplaced contig NT_113961 comprising the sole finished component AL163540.11 has been localized through admixture mapping to the pericentromeric region of chromsome 9. The component will be retained in the assembly for GRCh38.

issue.description: In this region, the ABO gene in the reference assembly reflects a haplotype of "Type O" not found in the human population.
issue.resolution_text:
Component AL772161.10 has replaced component AL158826.23 in the reference assembly.
The switch points between AL732364 and AL772161 have been curated to ensure that only one haplotype is represented. The ABO gene contained solely within AL772161 is a functional A1.02 allele. The updated version is available as a patch for GRCh37: GL339450.1
Despite being released as a GRCh37 FIX patch, this issue was not present in the GRCh38 primary assembly. This issue has now been addressed by the GRCh38.p1 FIX patch associated with ticket HG-2030

issue.description: NM_201453.2 aligns to GRCh37 AL353608.20 with GT-AC splice sites at 539^540 the 'C' might be polymorphic or an error. [murphyte]
issue.resolution_text: FQ976557 (PCR_RP11_AL353608_1) has been sequenced and shows a G in place of the C represented in the reference. It will be entered into the TPF to correct the error.

issue.summary: There areredundant clones in the assembly between FP928979 and BX248098
issue.description: There areredundant clones in the assembly between FP928979 and BX248098
issue.resolution_text: Redundant clones (ABC8-41123000P14 and WI2-0549G17) have been cancelled and removed from the TPF

issue.summary: FIX patch for Chr.9 Gap Problem Region #3 (left side)
issue.description: There is a reference assembly gap between CR392000.2 and BX649589.3. This is a duplicate issue used for patch release of an extension from the left side into the gap.
issue.resolution_text: An extension from the left side of this gap since GRCh37 was released as a FIX patch: GL383537.1.
